text: f'in jadlk -ayha alrswl- 'ahl alkitab fi altwhyd baed 'an aqmt alhujat ealayhim faqul lhm: 'iinani akhlst lilah wahdah fala 'ushrik bih ahdana, wkdhlk min atabaeani min almwmnyn, akhlsu lilah wanqadu lh. waqul lahum wlmshrky alearab wghyrhm: 'iina aslmtm fa'antum ealaa altariq almustaqim walhda walhq, wa'iin tawalaytum fhsabkm ealaa allh, walays ely 'iilaa alblagh, waqad 'ablaghtukum waqmt ealaykum alhj. wallah basir balebad, la yakhfaa ealayh min 'amrihim shy'
